statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPFirewall)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPVpc)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP Firewalls that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPFirewall)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPVpc)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP VPC-to-Firewall relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPPublicIpAddress)<-[:MEMBER_OF_PUBLIC_IP_ADDRESS]-(:GCPFirewall)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPVpc)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:GCPPublicIpAddress)<-[r:MEMBER_OF_PUBLIC_IP_ADDRESS]-(:GCPFirewall)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPVpc)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:GCPVpc)-[:RESOURCE]->(:GCPFirewall)-[r:HAS_TARGET_TAG]-(:GCPTag) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP Firewall-to-Tag relationships that are out of date. Deleting the tag itself is taken care of in GCP instance cleanup.

statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:GCPVpc)-[:RESOURCE]->(:GCPFirewall)-[:ALLOWED_BY|DENIED_BY]->(n:GCPIpRule) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP Ip Rules that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:GCPVpc)-[:RESOURCE]->(:GCPFirewall)-[r:ALLOWED_BY|DENIED_BY]->(:GcpIpRule) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP Firewall-to-IpRule relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:GCPVpc)-[:RESOURCE]->(:GCPFirewall)-[:ALLOWED_BY|DENIED_BY]->(:GCPIpRule)-[r:MEMBER_OF_IP_RULE]->(:IpRange) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP IpRule-to-IpRange relationships that are out of date.
